examples.example: 我站在街的这一面，看着对面热闹的店铺。

translate.english: I stand on this side of the street, looking at the bustling shops across.

examples.example: 我坐在窗边，望着对面美丽的风景，心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: I sit by the window, looking at the beautiful scenery opposite, and feel extremely comfortable.

examples.example: 我站在桥的这一端，望着对面如画的山水，心中满是欢喜。

translate.english: I stand at this end of the bridge, looking at the picturesque landscape on the opposite side, and my heart is full of joy.
